title: 3BR Apartment in NORTH PARK SLOPE with Washer/Dryer in unit for rent
broker_fee: yes there is a brokers fee
posting_body: ['● in unit washer dryer', '● Dishwasher', '● 3 separate bedrooms', '● Stand up shower', 'This shareable true 3-bedroom second floor apartment has plenty of room.', 'The living room and kitchen are open to one another, and the separate bedrooms are spacious.', 'There are hardwood floors throughout along with exposed brick to add charm to the space.', 'The three exposures allow for natural light to bathe the apartment.', 'washer-dryer is included.', 'The unit has recently been spruced up with fresh paint, refinished hardwood floors, a freshened kitchen with new stainless steel appliances, and a new tiled bathroom.', 'Located just off of bustling 5th Avenue in North Park Slope, the location is extremely central and convenient.', 'A multitude of dining, shopping, and nightlife are at your fingertips.', 'Transit options include the Union Street R and the Bergen Street 2/3 along with bus service.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '...', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', 'Fort Greene | Crown Heights | Boerum Hill | South Brooklyn | NYC | Downtown | Williamsburg | Greenwood Heights | Greenpoint | Sunset Park | Bushwick | Kensington | Gowanus | Prospect Park | Bed Stuy | Carroll Gardens | Cobble Hill | Brooklyn Heights | Prospect Heights | Lefferts Garden | Bed stuy | Crown Heights | Windsor Terrace | Kensington |Ditmas South North | Boerum Hill | Crown Heights | Midwood | Ocean Avenue | Dumbo | Red hook Columbia Waterfront District | Bay Ridge Parkway', 'Sterling St John Lincoln Berkeley Union President Carroll Garfield Warren Butler Baltic Degraw Sackett Degraw Street Place pl | Astoria | Harlem | Windsor Terrace | Prospect park | fort greene | red hook | Sunset Park | Bay Ridge | sheepshead bay | coney island | brighton beach | mill basin | bensonhurst | Park Slope | Park Slope south | Borough Park | Ditmas Park | Greenwood| Parkville |']
